titles.title: Zero Gravity, Zero Tax Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax incentives for investing in companies involved in space-related activities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/16/2001--Introduced. Zero Gravity, Zero Tax Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income: (1) space-related income; and (2) gain on the sale or exchange of any stock of a qualified space corporation.Establishes a space company investment credit for the purchase of qualified stock in a qualified space company.
